response.name: Failure
response.body:
Cisco SD-WAN
Cisco vManage

Invalid User or Password

item.name: vSmart Template

response.name: Success
Success
Success
In progress
Success
Success

item.description:
Build a factory default template to move the vSmart from CLI mode to vManage mode. Notes/examples:

get feature templates, feed IDs into build template (in sandbox these values are fixed, low effort)

vsmart "templateId": 8edb21b1-3aa0-4e00-88db-5381c4aaeb46

also need to get devices to extract vsmart uuid

feeds into "attach template" in 2 places (As does vsmart uuid)

attach "templateId": push_feature_template_configuration-9545500b-0c5a-4adc-9fd7-60eb98e73c3c

feeds into URL of "get template attachment status"

starts off as "statusId": "in_progress"

completes as: "statusId": "done"

item.name: vSmart Policy

response.name: Success
Success
In progress
Success

item.description:
Build a simple policy using a subnet of sites, a single full-mesh VPN, and a voice SLA class matching DSCP 46. Apply the policy to vSmart once complete. Notes/examples:

add policy site "listId": "2c5022fa-c5ed-4bc9-9b65-1166f1189b6b"

add policy vpn "listId": "61949ba1-c6e4-4539-97ab-b45ab9208b46"

add policy sla "listId": "bcd001f8-04cc-4601-b50e-7730d296fe58"

site/vpn IDs feed into mesh topology, returns: "definitionId": "2cf6ffc8-10ac-4ed8-8afc-e99f42f6b655"

use mesh definitionId in "get mesh" GET request at end of URL

policy sla listId feeds into "approute" under the slaClass "ref"

add policy approute "definitionId": "9a6b173c-8c67-4074-80e6-8539815edbb2"

use approute definitionId in "get approute" GET request at end of URL

add policy requires the site listId, vpn listId, approute definitionId, and mesh definitionId (does not need the sla ID). success with no response

need to issue "get policy vsmart" to see "policyId": "0ff16784-9746-486c-8c5b-f782a3c47851"

use policyId in activation URL which returns "id": "vsmart_policy_config-d7556879-24cb-4e20-a60d-8511dfdf613d"


use the above "id" in the activation status url.

starts as: "status": "in_progress",

completes as: "status": "done"

response.name: Already exists
Success
